Name: KAC M110 7.62x51 Sniper Rifle
Description: In the 1990s, KAC introduced the SR-25 rifle, combining features of the AR-15 and AR-10. Initially marketed for civilian use, its excellent performance caught the attention of the US military. During the selection of a new sniper rifle for the US military, the modified version of the SR-25, the SR-XM110, emerged victorious, and a few months later, the M110 officially entered service with the US military.
